title: iPhone 8 and 7S to launch at September 12 Apple event – report
description: ![TimCook]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * It’s more difficult to pick holes in the WSJ’s track record, though while itis reliable, it’s also not perfect. Plus, Apple likes nothing more than tospring a surprise, so we’d stress that nothing is set in stone until Applemails out official iPhone launch invites.We think this will happen towards the end of next week, so as to best spoilthe [IFA 2017](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ifa-2017-news-rumours-highlights-2993271) party and put a damper on new phones from rivals like LGand Sony.As well as the iPhone 8 and 7S/7S Plus, Apple is being tipped to reveal aspecial [10 Year Anniversary EditioniPhone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-10-year-anniversary-edition-news-rumours-price-release-date-specs-features-2951157) this autumn,and a host of updates to other key product lines.Most notably, these include the [Apple Watch3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-watch-3-release-date-series-3-rumours-features-price-3196092) and a [4K AppleTV,](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/4k-apple-tv-release-date-news-rumours-specs-price-2953139) but we’re also expecting to get more details onits nascent [HomePod](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-homepod-release-date-price-specs-features-uk-2950931) smart home speaker.That’s the latest news, but stay tuned as more information should becomeavailable soon.**Related:[Best smartphones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-smartphone)****Do you think September 12 is when the iPhone 8 will be revealed? Tweet yourthoughts to @TrustedReviews.**
